alert.note: Alert for Lake (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 9:47AM CST until January 28 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Lake Effect Snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches. * WHERE...Far Southeast Lake IL County. * WHEN...Until 2 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel impacts will be confined to the southeastern portion of the county with little to no additional snow over the remainder of the county.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
